{{Wired embedded system |brand=Brite-View |model=BV-254 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=Powerline Adapter |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.08 |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug AV |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} ''Powerline Ethernet Switch 200 Mbps''
[http://www.brite-view.com/product.php?P=1 Product Page]
Sold as part of the BV-210C ''200 Mbps Powerline Ethernet Adapter Kit'' which contains this adapter and a [[Brite-View BV-210]]. The [[Rocketfish RF-GUV1124]] is the same kit rebranded.
